properties.property:
local BlockPlayer = require "actions/BlockPlayer" local MessageBox = require "actions/MessageBox" local Menu = require "actions/Menu" local Do = require "actions/Do" local Action = require "actions/Action"
local Transform = require "util/Transform" local Layout = require "util/Layout"
return function(self) if GameState.leader == "sonic" then return BlockPlayer { MessageBox {message="Sonic: Sal's science textbooks... {p50}Boooring.", textSpeed=4}, Do(function() self:refreshKeyHint() end) } elseif GameState.leader == "sally" then return BlockPlayer { MessageBox {message="Sally: I haven't read some of these in quite awhile... {p40}! {p20}'The adventures of Windom'! {p20}I remember my father reading this to me."}, MessageBox {message="Sally: Maybe I could read it to Tails."}, Do(function() self:refreshKeyHint() end) } elseif GameState.leader == "bunny" then return BlockPlayer { MessageBox {message="Bunnie: My goodness, {p40}that Sally-girl sure is a book worm!"}, Do(function() self:refreshKeyHint() end) } end return Action() end
